Key Match Events: The Cleveland Cavaliers closed out the game with an 18-8 run in the last six minutes, stealing the lead from the Bucks.
Jarrett Allen sealed the win by blocking Lillard at the rim.
Pre-Game Insights: The Bucks were without Giannis Antetokounmpo due to a right adductor strain.
Post-Match Reflections: Doc Rivers addressed the Bucks' defense breakdown that allowed Allen to score deep in the paint.
Rivers gave props to Darius Garland for making tough shots.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks had their sixth straight loss.
The Bucks fought hard until the final buzzer.
Others: Damian Lillard stepped up with another stellar showing, finishing with 36 points on 11-for-22 shooting.
